summary: The module provides utilities to embed visual watermarks into images produced by the Stable Diffusion XL model. It defines watermark data constants, checks for invisible watermark support, and implements a class that prepares and overlays watermark graphics using NumPy and PyTorch tensors.
business_intent: To enable attribution and detection of AI‑generated images, protecting intellectual property and supporting compliance with usage policies for Stable Diffusion XL outputs.
